name: setup-sda
description: Minimalist setup scripts for the JavaScript library simple-data-analysis.

scripts.publish-patch: deno publish --dry-run && npm version patch && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish
scripts.publish-minor: deno publish --dry-run && npm version minor && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish
scripts.publish-major: deno publish --dry-run && npm version minor && npm publish && deno run -A syncJsrVersion.js && git commit -m 'Syncing NPM/JSR versions' && deno publish

author: nael.shiab@gmail.com
